articles.title: Crypto hedge fund Three Arrows files for bankruptcy - Financial Times
articles.description: Move by embattled investment firm comes days after liquidation proceedings began in British Virgin Islands
articles.content:
Three Arrows Capital has filed for Chapter 15 bankruptcy in New York, days after the beleaguered crypto hedge fund’s liquidation commenced in the British Virgin Islands.
